meta.description: Scrapes rating infomation from Kids-In-Mind.com website. Most pages of the Kids-in-Mind site are supported including search by rating and search by keyword. Movie information varies by page, so some elements may not be present in every result set. Searches default to returning only first page results. Keyword search results may not include all result pages due to non-movie results on page. Effectiveness of scraping subject to change without notice due to source site redesigns.
meta.author: David Robarts
